Name: 20 Minutes Till Dawn
About the game: Survive the onslaught of an endless horde of monsters for 20 minutes! Unique Builds Every Run In this roguelite survival game, select from a variety of upgrades to create a unique and overpowered builds every run. You can be a fire wizard, for example, and ignite monsters with every pump of your shotgun, or an agile ninja who controls magic knives to pierce your enemies. Select Your Hero Choose from a diverse selection of characters and weapons that offer a variety of gameplay experiences. Features Over 50 different upgrades too choose from for a unique experience every run! Wide cast of characters, with more to come post-launch. Casual quick 10-20 minute play sessions, for busy gamers. Rune System helps you become stronger
